statements: UPDATE behavior_patterns SET target_name = 'John Doe', behavior_type = 'Positive' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_description = 'This is a test pattern' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_description = 'New description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET target_name = 'New target', behavior_type = 'New type' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE targets SET name = 'Alice', age = 25 WHERE target_id = 1;
UPDATE behaviors SET behavior_description = 'Clicked on ad' WHERE behavior_id = 2;
UPDATE targets SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE target_id = 1;
UPDATE behaviors SET behavior_type = 'Purchase' WHERE target_id = 1 AND behavior_id = 5;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_type = 'New Pattern Type', behavior_description = 'Updated Behavior Description' WHERE target_id = 1;
UPDATE persuasive_messages SET message_text = 'Updated Message Text' WHERE message_id = 2;
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET behavior_description = 'Updated behavior description' WHERE target_id = 1;
UPDATE social_engineering_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE target_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', last_login='2022-01-05' WHERE target_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE behavior_patterns SET pattern_description='Updated pattern description', pattern_name='New Pattern Name' WHERE pattern_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE target_profiles SET phone_number='+1234567890', birthday='1990-05-15' WHERE target_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE campaign_activity SET activity_timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, activity_type='Clicked' WHERE target_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND campaign_id='98765432-1234-e89b-a456-426614187654';
UPDATE targets SET location='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value='High' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE targets SET phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'High' WHERE target_id = 2 AND preference_type = 'Priority';
